thread.section_title: Gym Source Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gym Source | gymsource.com
thread.title: Bob G
thread.title_full: Gym Source reviewed by Bob G

author: Bob G
title: Bob G
text: After discussing other options and features with Ryan, who was very helpful, I bought the Schwinn Aerodyne. GymSource had the best price of anywhere I checked, online or in stores. I picked it up and assembled it myself but had some problems getting the arms just right. Called Ryan and he had the Service staff get in touch with me. Very knowledgeable and personable Oscar then came over and made the necessary adjustments. This is a great bike and it works fine!
